name: Death's Door 0.9
description:
You are friends of a wealthy philanthropist, Dr. Jefferson Harris-Gordon, who has invited you to his birthday party. Unfortunately, a mishap at midnight left you and the rest of the guests stunned as the power went out, and an attempt to restore it revealed dear Jefferson dead.

How he died and who killed him is what you must figure out. You will interact with the other guests, hear their alibis, ally yourself as you see fit, and determine who among you committed the heinous crime.

Death’s Door is a 3-6 player tabletop game that operates on the assumption that the players will not be sitting around a table in a traditional setting. There is no GM in this game. Gameplay consists of a group of characters working together to solve a mystery in tandem and to discover the murderer in their midst. It is a cooperative game based on the assumption that wherever possible, you will be honest- or at least pretend to be.
